meanings.definition: To make something a theme or central focus.
meanings.sent1: She thematized her birthday party by decorating everything in a unicorn theme.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will thematize the classroom to create a more engaging learning environment.
meanings.sent3: The cat thematized the house with its obsession for chasing shadows.
meanings.sent4: His speech thematized the importance of kindness in everyday interactions.
meanings.sent5: The artist thematized nature in her beautiful landscape paintings.

meanings.definition: To give something a specific theme or topic.
meanings.sent1: The event planner will thematize the party with a tropical theme.
meanings.sent2: The author will thematize her new book around the concept of time travel.
meanings.sent3: The chef thematized the menu with a fusion of Italian and Japanese cuisines.
meanings.sent4: The director thematized the movie with elements of mystery and suspense.
meanings.sent5: The museum curator thematized the exhibit around ancient civilizations.
